## Logic Blocks

* ![](img/and.png) <br/> Reports true only if **both** of its inputs are true.
* ![](img/or.png) <br/> Reports true if **either** of its inputs are true.
* ![](img/not.png) <br/> Reports the **opposite** of its input.
